ReleaseNotes.string:
Major release with many improvements and bug fixes, including:

  • Support for per-machine and per-user installations from the same installer
  • Custom commands can now be based on other custom commands
  • New option to get the path of an actual shortcut instead of the path of its target
  • New custom command feature to replace parts of the path with environment variable references
  • Windows of the Settings application can no longer appear offscreen

This is the first release requiring Windows Vista at a minimum. Grab it now!

New minor release with improvements and bug fixes, most notably:

  • New preview box when editing custom commands
  • Dialogs used to edit custom commands will remember their size
  • Custom commands now remember in which mode they were edited last
  • Installer is now signed and recognized as a trusted publisher

Get full list of changes on the release page. A recommended upgrade for all users!
